subject: (He)
body:
I’m thankful that bed we broke this morning was pretty cheap.

\- He (10/19/17). some poet in the mountains 

[what are you thankful for?](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1X6z1T5sSBXxFpfGI7gPZzQIp_qgkDCsVVCLV4yrw1a4/edit)
